4.5 Building an Automation controller application

4.5.2 Connecting to an Automation server application

Automation controllers connect to Automation servers using the function create-dispatch, page 225: 

let disp-interface = create-dispatch(class-ID);

This call instantiates a COM object of class class-ID, and returns an object representing the default dispinterface implemented by that COM class. The class-ID argument is a COM Class ID, as discussed in Section 4.3.2 on page 173.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
